name: BudhaSubba Temple
description: Budhasubba Mandir is uniquely notable for its blend of local folklore and the ritual of animal sacrifices, highlighting the community's spiritual and cultural identity

name: Kanyam
description: Kanyam is a picturesque tea garden village in eastern Nepal, renowned for its lush landscapes and serene atmosphere

name: Halesi Mahadev
description: It is cave and temple which has  venerated pilgrimage site for Hindus, Buddhists and Kirat.

name: Janakpurdham
description: It is is renowned as the birthplace of Sita from the Ramayana and a center of Mithila culture and art.

name: Gosaikunda Lake
description: Gosaikunda Lake is a sacred alpine lake situated at an altitude of 4,380 meters (14,370 feet) and is an important pilgrimage site for Hindus.

name: Pashupatinath Temple
description: It is devoted to the Hindu god Shiva in his form as Pashupati, protector of animals.

name: Krishna Mandir
description: It was a cultural stronghold of the Malla kings of Kathmandu valley

name: Changu Narayan Temple
description: It is the oldest temple in Nepal dating back to the 5th century.

name: Pumdikot Shiva Statue
description: Pumdikot has the second tallest statue of Shiva in Nepal. The statue itself is 51 feet tall. It sits on a white stupa that adds 57 feet in height, making the entire structure 108 feet high.

name: Tilicho Lake
description: Tilicho Lake is one of the highest lakes in the world, located at an altitude of 4,919 meters (16,138 feet) in the Nepalese Himalayas.

name: Chiuri Bhir
description: It is known to be as an adventerous place with beautiful view of Aadhikhola river below and has a suspension bridge to experience the thrill.

name: Akaladevi Temple
description: It is a ancient temple with wide range of religious status and is considered as templ of very powerful goddess.

name: Galyang Multiple Campus
description: It is an Educational institution affiliated to TU and offers diverse range of Bachelor's levels courses in affordable prices and quality environment.

name: Aalam Devi Mandir
description: It is a religious place located in Galyang Syangja consisting ancient ritual practice.

name: Siddha Gufa
description: It is a ancient cave consisting various ancient structures and statues.

name: Chhaya Chhetra Temple (Chhangchhangdi)
description: This is an ancient temple containing various religious aspects. This temple is very popular as lord Shiva is worshiped out there.

name: Beldanda Hiking Trail
description: A scenic hiking trail with opportunities to spot local wildlife and enjoy nature.

name: Bhalupahad
description: Bhalu Pahad, located in Syangja district, Nepal, is a charming hill station known for its scenic beauty and serene environment. Easily accessible via the Siddhartha Highway, it's a popular spot for picnics and sightseeing.

name: sorek maidan
description: It is hill providing beautiful scenario with clouds and feels like a way to heaven. Also often professional paragliders also do paraglidings from there

name: Garausur Mandir
description: It is a religious place located in Galyang Syangja consisting ancient ritual practice.

name: Rani Mahal
description: Historical palace for a queen made by a king.

name: Lumbini
description: Birth Place of Lord Buddha

name: Rara Lake
description: Rara lake is  the largest fresh water lake in the Nepalese Himalayas
